predicate.note: Frames file for 'syncopate' based on instances in Webtext 2.5-2. No VerbNet entry.

roleset.name: to accent a normally unaccented beat

example.name: Descriptive usage
example.text: ...During her much earlier 'Rythm Nation' period, in which she dons a black uniform and uses strange, syncopated hand movements in her video dance routine...
